channel.title: Ring of stone that turns u into stone
channel.description:
in client.java
search for [code]public boolean process()[/code] under that add
[code]if ((playerEquipment[playerRing] == 6583) && npcId2 != 2626) { // made by i noob i npcId2 = 2626; // made by i noob i isNpc = true; // made by i noob i sendMessage("You equip the ring..."); // made by i noob i sendMessage("...and turn into an rock!"); // made by i noob i } else if ((playerEquipment[playerRing] != 6583) && npcId2 == 2626) { // made by i noob i npcId2 = 0; // made by i noob i isNpc = false; // made by i noob i sendMessage("You take off the ring..."); // made by i noob i sendMessage("...and turn back into a human."); // made by i noob i [/code]
to make the ring go into ringslot open item.java and behind [code]public static int rings[] = {[/code]
add: [code]6583,[/code]

item.title: Ring of stone that turns u into stone

item.title: Ring of stone that turns u into stone
item.dc:creator: @zammyking111 zammyking111
item.description:
@zammyking111 wrote:

if ((playerEquipment[playerRing] == 6583) && npcId2 != 2626) { // made by i noob i npcId2 = 2626; // made by i noob i isNpc = true; // made by i noob i updateRequired = true; //Made By Zammyking111 appearanceUpdateRequired = true; //Made by zammyking111 sendMessage("You equip the ring..."); // made by i noob i sendMessage("...and turn into an rock!"); // made by i noob i } else if ((playerEquipment[playerRing] != 6583) && npcId2 == 2626) { // made by i noob i npcId2 = 0; // made by i noob i isNpc = false; // made by i noob i updateRequired = true; //Made by zammyking111 appearanceUpdateRequired = true; //Made by zammyking111 sendMessage("You take off the ring..."); // made by i noob i sendMessage("...and turn back into a human."); // made by i noob i

that would make it a little bit better
Or you could simply just do this

if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == 6583 == true){//coded by aaa801 npcId = 2626; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }else if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == 6583 == false){ isNpc = false; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Read full topic
